system_info.name: Complete Application Card System
system_info.description: All 26 application cards across domains with effects and visual designs

card_system_overview.storage_location: Study desk journal in hill home

card_acquisition_flow: Player unlocks a star using SP
Red exclamation point appears on desk
Player opens journal to discover new card
Card can be equipped in one of three slots

visual_design.description: A glowing optimal beam path threading through stylized anatomical structures, with constellation points marking critical waypoints. The path pulses with mathematical equations that transform into accelerating particles.
visual_design.border: Electric blue circuitry patterns with optimization nodes
visual_design.icon: An infinity symbol made of converging beam paths

visual_design.description: A fluid, shapeshifting dose distribution that morphs to accommodate different tissue densities. Heterogeneous materials float like cosmic debris, each with their own gravitational pull on the dose cloud.
visual_design.icon: A dynamic flux symbol that shifts between states

visual_design.description: Multiple transparent timelines spiraling around a central eye made of stars. Future possibilities branch out like probability trees, with glimpses of activities visible in each branch.
visual_design.icon: An eye with an hourglass pupil

visual_design.description: Schrödinger's cat silhouette made of particle trails, simultaneously existing and not existing. Dice made of pure energy float in quantum superposition.
visual_design.icon: A quantum die showing all faces at once

visual_design.description: Twin mirror dose distributions facing each other, one solid and bright, the other hollow and dark. Between them, a balance scale tips dramatically one way or the other.
visual_design.icon: Two overlapping circles, one filled, one empty

visual_design.description: A ghostly mentor's hand overlaid on the player's, guiding treatment delivery with perfect precision. Green energy flows from fingertips like controlled radiation.
visual_design.icon: Interlocked hands with energy transfer

visual_design.description: A treatment field becoming transparent like glass, revealing hidden tumor boundaries and critical structures beneath. Wrong pathways dissolve into mist.
visual_design.icon: A magnifying glass with revealing light

visual_design.description: A stopwatch face where each second is a patient breathing cycle. Time pressure creates visible waves of green energy that intensify treatment effects.
visual_design.border: Ticking clock mechanisms with radiation symbols
visual_design.icon: A stopwatch emitting radiation beams

visual_design.description: A tumor in motion tracked by adaptive crosshairs. Breathing patterns create rhythmic waves that the treatment beam follows like a dance.
visual_design.icon: Crosshairs following a wave pattern

visual_design.description: A protective energy barrier that catches falling momentum stars before they shatter. The net glows with reassuring green light.
visual_design.icon: A shield with a cushioning aura

overdrive.name: Overdrive
overdrive.active_effect: Break cap to L4 for triple, auto-reset

visual_design.description: Momentum lightning breaking through its normal constraints, crackling with unstable power. A fourth momentum star forms but glows dangerously bright.
visual_design.icon: Four lightning bolts in critical state

visual_design.description: A golden key card inserting into a timeline, reserving a premium treatment slot. Calendar blocks rearrange themselves to accommodate.
visual_design.icon: A key overlaid on a calendar

visual_design.description: A red emergency stop button surrounded by amber warning lights. Particle beams freeze mid-flight as systems safely power down.
visual_design.icon: An emergency stop symbol with particle trails

visual_design.description: Knowledge flowing like liquid metal from strong domains into weaker ones. Neural pathways light up showing accelerated learning connections.
visual_design.icon: An upward arrow with branching paths

visual_design.description: A time loop effect where a failed attempt rewinds itself. Ghost images of previous tries fade as a new opportunity crystallizes.
visual_design.icon: A refresh symbol with probability percentage

visual_design.description: A lone figure surrounded by a perfect circle of concentration. All distractions fade to black while the central work area glows with intense pink focus.
visual_design.icon: A target with converging rays

visual_design.description: Numbers and calculations floating in space, each decimal rounding upward like ascending stars. Mathematical perfection achieved through precise measurement.
visual_design.icon: An upward rounding arrow

visual_design.description: Multiple measurement devices arranged in a comparison array. Values shift from absolute to relative as reference points align.
visual_design.icon: Two balanced measurement symbols

visual_design.description: A grid of sensors lighting up to reveal hidden challenge difficulties. Each detector glows with intensity matching the challenge level it's reading.
visual_design.icon: Multiple detection points in formation

tomorrows_promise.name: Tomorrow's Promise
tomorrows_promise.passive_effect: Bank up to 20 Insight for tomorrow

visual_design.description: An hourglass where the bottom chamber opens into tomorrow's timeline. Stored insight crystallizes like temporal sand, ready to flow forward.
visual_design.icon: An hourglass with a forward arrow

visual_design.description: Mentor portraits connected by glowing relationship threads. As connections strengthen, energy multiplies exponentially across the network.
visual_design.icon: Interconnected figure symbols

visual_design.description: A warm aura emanating from caring hands, creating a healing space around a patient. Relationship bonds visualized as gentle light streams.
visual_design.icon: A heart with radiating care lines
